feature.correlation

Class CorrelationCoefficient

  • java.lang.Object
    • feature.correlation.CorrelationCoefficient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DistanceCorrelation, PearsonCorrelation, SpearmanCorrelation

    public class CorrelationCoefficient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sets up the basics of correlation testing in datasets and is meant to be extended to specific correlation measures.

    • Method Detail

      • correlation

        public static float correlation(DataSet dset,
                float[] first,
                float[] second)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests for correlation.
        Parameters:
        dset - DataSet data context, if needed.
        first - First value array.
        second - Second value array.
        Returns:
        Correlation measure.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • correlation

        public static float correlation(DataSet dset,
                int type,
                int indexFirst,
                int indexSecond)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests for correlation between different features of a same dataset.
        Parameters:
        dset - DataSet data context.
        type - Feature type, as in DataMineConstants.
        indexFirst - Index of the first feature to compare.
        indexSecond - Index of the second feature to compare.
        Returns:
        Correlation measure between the two features, as a float value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
